metadata.title: CVE-2023-2618 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-preview 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
A vulnerability, which was classified as problematic, has been found inOpenCV wechat_qrcode Module up to 4.7.0. Affected by this issue is thefunction DecodedBitStreamParser::decodeHanziSegment of the fileqrcode/decoder/decoded_bit_stream_parser.cpp. The manipulation leads tomemory leak. The attack may be launched remotely. The name of the patch is2b62ff6181163eea029ed1cab11363b4996e9cd6. It is recommended to apply apatch to fix this issue. The identifier of this vulnerability isVDB-228548.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-2618` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libopencv-calib3d4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-contrib4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-core4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-dnn4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-features2d4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-flann4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-highgui4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-imgcodecs4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-imgproc4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-ml4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-objdetect4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-photo4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-shape4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-stitching4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-superres4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-video4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-videoio4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-videostab4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv-viz4.5d - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv4.5-java - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
libopencv4.5d-jni - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
opencv-data - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
python3-opencv - 4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: opencv package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.5.4+dfsg-9ubuntu4+esm1').
